ability.description: * When using the Kitchen Sink, you may instead: * Place a card on Unlikely Weapon AND Unlikely Helmet * Treat the bonuses granted by each as if you were Strong (3) and Fast (3). * Draw 2 cards (Wise: 3, Foolish: 1). * Take 1 Corruption Point
